section.heading: Right to alter, amend, or repeal reserved.
section.text: Congress reserves the right to alter, amend, or repeal this subtitle.

annotations.annotation: General provisions, construction and severability of law, see § 34-403.

For temporary (225 days) general provisions during COVID-19 emergency, see § 3(k) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-125, July 24, 2021, 68 DCR 007342).

For temporary (225 days) general provisions during COVID-19 emergency, see § 3(k) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-39, Oct. 27, 2021, 68 DCR 009487).
For temporary (90 days) general provisions during COVID-19 emergency, see § 2(b) of Tenant Safe Harbor Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-231, Dec. 13, 2021, 68 DCR 013238).
For temporary (90 days) general provisions during COVID-19 emergency, see § 2(c) of Tenant Safe Harbor Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-231, Dec. 13, 2021, 68 DCR 013238).
